Contact Us

Connect with us to create a world where survivors are supported.

message sent!

Ways to Contact Us

General inquiries
contact@projectcallisto.org

Press inquiries
press@projectcallisto.org

If you are a survivor and are in need of immediate help, please contact the National Sexual Assault Hotline 1-800-656-4673.

Please download The Callisto Survivor’s Guide for resources.
the survivor’s guide
Do you know of an institution that needs Callisto?

If you know of a college, workplace, or organization that could use Callisto, you can nominate that institution.

Do you want to bring Callisto to your institution?

If you are a decision-maker who is ready to bring Callisto to your organization, please join our waiting list.

Callisto envisions a world where victims of sexual assault and coercion are supported and perpetrators are held accountable.

You can also get involved with Callisto by donating to support our mission, or by applying to work with us.
